facts: Eve occupied the land for 12 years, then sold her interest to Frank
Frank has continued the same hostile occupation for 10 more years
There was privity between Eve and Frank (deed transfer)
The use has been continuous, open, and hostile throughout
asp_facts: claim(c5). claimant(c5, frank). property_type(c5, land). occupation_years(c5, 22). occupation_continuous(c5, yes). occupation_open(c5, yes). occupation_hostile(c5, yes). taxes_paid(c5, yes). statutory_period(c5, 20). tacking_allowed(c5, yes).
question: Has Frank acquired title through adverse possession?
rationale: When there is privity between successive possessors, their periods of possession can be tacked together. Eve's 12 years plus Frank's 10 years equals 22 years, exceeding the 20-year statutory period.
